title: Turkey meatballs in tomato sauce
ingredients: ['1 slice wholemeal bread', '50ml milk', '500g minced turkey', '1 small bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '200g frozen spinach, defrosted', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 carrot, finely sliced', '300g passata']
